text: @GavinNewsom Conformity not safety.  Do as we say, not as we do.  You have zero leadership skills.  You are anti-American civil liberties.  Masks don’t work.  Never have.  And the death toll from COVID19?  Why don’t you talk about how that is going down.  More testing and cheating by Team D.
